product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 Count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 64 ratings.

banner_details:
The banner design features a modern and elegant layout divided into four quadrants, each with a soft pink-toned background. At the top left, the **brand_name** text appears bold and prominent, followed by a product **heading** using a clean, futuristic font. The **subheading** below adds a premium impression with fine typography. The lower left quadrant showcases product features listed in **description**, with the **price** emphasized using a bold, dark pink font. Beneath this, a rounded rectangular **cta_background** button in vibrant pink holds a crisp white **cta** text prompting action. To the right, the **product_image** showcases the jewelry, while the **tagline** adds an emotional appeal near the top right quadrant.

**Color Palette:**
- Light Pink: `#FFF5F5`, `#FFEBEE`, `#FFD1D6`, `#FFDAD8`, `#FFE4E1`
- Accent Pinks: `#D81B60`, `#C2185B`, `#AD1457`, `#880E4F`, `#E57373`
- Highlight Elements: `#FFFFFF` (CTA text)

The background includes abstract curved lines and translucent circles to enhance visual depth without overpowering the layout.
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of elegant earrings that combine a rose gold metal base with sparkling white stones and soft pink enamel accents. The primary color palette includes Rose Gold (#EFA8A1), Crystal White (#FFFFFF), Soft Blush Pink (#FAD0C9), and Diamond Silver (#D9D9D9). The rose gold provides warmth and luxury, forming the circular structure and framing elements. Sparkling white stones are strategically placed to create contrast and shine, enhancing the overall radiance. Subtle blush pink petals highlight femininity and elegance. These colors effortlessly blend but are accentuated through reflective textures and gemstone cuts, making them ideal for luxury-oriented advertisement banners.
